Мастер фраза для определения максимально: Well, that old thing almost tore me to pieces for its g
dialogs_chapter_5_Рикард покинул Чистили:
Ricard has left Purgatory. He went to the southern
region of the canyon, where there is a surviving 
detachment of combat reapers.
dialogs_chapter_5_У меня есть одна прось: I have one request for you, Laurita.
dialogs_chapter_5_Хочешь, чтобы я его ос: Do you want me to stop him?
dialogs_chapter_5_Постарайся добраться д:
Try to get to the squad before Rickard and
take all the combat reapers under your command.
dialogs_chapter_5_Так же там будет много:
There will also be many wounded there, about them
Commander Rita's group will take care of it.
dialogs_chapter_5_С тобой пойдет один из:
One of my best will go with you
scouts - Kenchiru.
dialogs_chapter_5_Он будет докладывать о:
He will report everything that happens
around Rick.
dialogs_chapter_5_Ты серьезно хочешь изб: Do you seriously want to get rid of Rickard?
dialogs_chapter_5_Пусть он и чудной, но:
Even if he is wonderful, his sword has killed a lot of
dangerous enemies.
dialogs_chapter_5_Даже если у тебя выйде:
Even if you manage to dig into him
convincing compromising evidence\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_5_Госпожа не отдаст прик: The lady will not give the order to kill him.
dialogs_chapter_5_Скажи, почему ты так с: Tell me why do you hate him so much?
dialogs_chapter_5_Я думала, это из-за ха:
I thought it was because of Rickard's character, his
mockery\..\..\.. but the point is definitely different.
dialogs_chapter_5_Когда останешься с ним:
When you are alone with him, you will see
what he really is.
dialogs_chapter_5_Хорошо, буду осторожна: Okay, I'll be careful with him.
dialogs_chapter_5_Если встречу Риома, чт: If I meet Ryom, what should I tell him?
dialogs_chapter_5_Мы с матерью любим его:
My mother and I love him and pray that he
got out alive and healthy.
dialogs_chapter_5_Если у вас с Риомом вс:
If things work out extremely well between you and 
Riom lucky - the doors in my house are always open
for you.
dialogs_chapter_5_Эх-х, Риомка, не стоит:
Eh, Riomka, you shouldn't push the sword in the first
any scabbard.
dialogs_chapter_5_Надеюсь, Лаурита единс:
I hope Laurita is the only one, otherwise,
A difficult choice awaits you\..\..\..
Your squad is waiting for you.\.
Kenchiru and Rita should be close by now
teleport.
dialogs_chapter_5_На связи ударный батал:
The shock battalion of combat reapers is in touch\..\..\..
more precisely\..\..\..
We need help. Urgently. We have dozens of 
wounded, combat-ready - only a few.\
dialogs_chapter_5_В вашу сторону идут дв:
Two large detachments are coming in your direction.\.
Commander Rickard with a group of punitive forces and 
Werolomger Laurita with battle reapers. \.
Hold out until they arrive.
dialogs_chapter_5_Локация недоступна в д: The location is not available in this version.
dialogs_chapter_5_Но пока что это все! С: But that's all for now! Save and see you soon.
